name: PrototoroP
description:
A game about a prototype ship shooting prototype ships in a prototype space! Cycle between 3 weapons, each with its own advantages, and survive as many rounds as you can!

Controls

  • [Move] Arrow Keys / WASD
  • [Shoot] Q / Space / Enter
  • [Swap Weapons] E / LShift / RShift
  • [Esc] Pause game
  • [Developer Mode] H

Have fun surviving!

Assets used in this game:

  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack 
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
